text: haey nowpel del krohthnak ban kaetlaeng champoh puok anak now leusa moutr ku anak( preah neanea) del puok anak buongsuong som noh ban batbng asa leuklengte trong muoy kt . kabonde nowpel del trong ban sangkroh puok anak towleukok puok anak bercha ngeak chenh( pi trong) towvinh . haey mnoussa lok chea anak del brachheang(rmilkoun champoh nie k meat robsa a l laoh)
